resources.string: Please, rate your awaking. Your opinion will help us to improve the algorithm of the alarm clock

string-array.name: feedback_thanks_0
string-array.item: We will try harder next morning!
I\'m really sorry that you start your day that way

string-array.name: feedback_thanks_5
string-array.item: Don\'t forget to tweet about that ;-)
We are really glad that you feel so good =)
Hope to see you next day!
